item.title: About
item.description:
About Me

Hi, I’m [Your Name], a passionate software developer with 4 years of diverse experience in the tech industry. Here’s a quick overview of my professional journey:

Experience

  • Mainframe Programmer at IBM
    Duration: 2.5 Years
    I began my career at IBM, working as a Mainframe programmer where I focused on optimizing legacy systems and ensuring efficient operation of critical business applications. I specialized in COBOL, JCL, and DB2 to deliver high-performing solutions.

item.title: Projects
item.description:
Software Projects

Below are some of the key projects I’ve worked on throughout my career as a software developer:

1. Mainframe Optimization Tool (IBM)

Role: Mainframe Programmer
Duration: 2.5 Years
Technologies: COBOL, JCL, DB2

Description:
Worked on optimizing a critical financial application running on IBM Mainframe systems. My contributions included improving batch processing times by refactoring COBOL code and designing automated reporting tools to streamline data extraction and visualization.

  • Key Achievements:
    • Reduced batch job execution time by 25%.
    • Developed a suite of tools that reduced manual reporting tasks by 40%.

2. Salesforce CRM Customization (Salesforce Startup)

Role: Salesforce Developer
Duration: 6 Months
Technologies: Apex, Visualforce, Salesforce Lightning
